title: Workplace exposure to pesticides and metals linked to heightened heart disease risk

title_detail.value: Workplace exposure to pesticides and metals linked to heightened heart disease risk

summary: Workplace exposure to metals and pesticides is linked to a heightened risk of heart disease in Hispanic and Latino workers, reveals new research.
